```{r}
sfc <- read.csv('train.csv')
dim(sfc)
names(sfc)
str(sfc)

sfc$DayOfWeek <- factor(sfc$DayOfWeek, levels=c("Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday", "Sunday"), ordered = TRUE)

sfc$Dates.POSIX <- as.POSIXct(sfc$Dates, tz="America/Los_Angeles", format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")

str(sfc)

summary(sfc)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

p <- ggplot(sfc, aes(x = Dates.POSIX)) +
  geom_histogram()

print(p)

p <- ggplot(sfc, aes(x = DayOfWeek)) +
  geom_histogram()

print(p)

p <- ggplot(sfc, aes(x = X, y = Y)) +
  geom_point()

print(p)

max(sfc$X)
max(sfc$Y)

p <- ggplot(subset(sfc, X < -120.5 & Y < 90), aes(x = X, y = Y)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.1)

print(p)
```
